text: With its food delivery service called Yogiyo,

WESANG is a platform where you can meet 
all kinds of food in the most convenient and enjoyable way.

Hello, I’m Jaewook Shim  
and I lead the Engineering Platform Team at WESANG.

We prioritize service stability, 
availability, and scalability as our business grows.
That’s why we chose AWS.
Stability is our top priority
because even the smallest problems can disrupt actual orders.
This is why we adopted Enterprise Support
to benefit from AWS’ operational expertise.
Beyond addressing issues on time,

we are receiving a lot of technical support for finding ways 
that can avoid potential issues and minimize impact.

We are experiencing higher costs  
as we scale our services and add more microservices.
Our biggest goal is to be cost-effective.
Trusted Advisor delivers AWS’ guidance on cost savings.
We were able to cut costs
by receiving systematic support on Reserved Instance and Savings Plan.

AWS came up with
multiple solutions that can help us save cost.
For instance, the AWS TAM Team actively supported Database Migration
when we were migrating Yogiyo’s main system from IDC to AWS.

Also, we received a lot of technical support  
in adopting RDS Proxy.
This all resulted in a successful migration.
In addition, through the Specialist TAM Team,

we conducted an OpenSearch Operational Review  
out of many Proactive Services,

which allowed us to stabilize OpenSearch
by adjusting the usage, version, type, and configuration values.

We used the Trusted Advisor Priority checklist 
suggested by the technical account manager in our operation,
making it more efficient.
Then came the Control Tower.
Enterprise Support was of great help along the way,

allowing us to execute a multi-accounts strategy  
which ultimately helped shape an excellent security governance.

We feel like we can reach out anytime,
as we are constantly communicating with experts like the TAM Team

The technical account manager 
sometimes comes to us and offer great solutions.
They understand our business as much as we do,
and use that knowledge to offer us guidance.
So I have little difficulty using AWS.

The ProServe team  
helped us a lot in our SAP on AWS journey.

Starting from EKS architecture design,
WESANG and AWS ProServe are working more closely

throughout the full EKS adoption journey
for stability and scalability.
Yogiyo recently launched a service called YogiPass-X.
Yogiyo has a lot of promotion events scheduled ahead.
We expect to leverage AWS Infrastructure Event Management
for a successful service launch and promotion events.

We hope to continue to experiment new things
based on our long-term partnership.
